label: $P3+
name: p3dollarplus
description: A more accurate version of $P3, adapted from Vatavu's $P+. It brings three key improvements to $P3: (1) each point from the template can now be matched to more than one point of the gesture; (2) the distance between a gesture and a template takes into account the connections between consecutive points (in the form of their turning angles); (3) early abandonment of templates.
